articles.content: Wayfinder, currently in closed beta on PC and PlayStation 5, is a MMORPG that borrows heavily from other greats of the genre. It feels like developer Airship Syndicate carefully pulled together the b… [+3280 chars]

articles.author: Tom Huddleston
articles.title: Americans want to delete Instagram more than any other app - CNBC
articles.description: More people searched for how to delete Instagram, Facebook and Snapchat than other apps over a recent six-month period, says cybersecurity website VPNOverview.
articles.content:
There are a lot of reasons why you might want to delete a popular app from their phone and you're far from alone.
